# Expo Assets Generator

> Free online tool that generates all required Expo/React Native app icons from a single image upload.

## What it does

Upload one PNG/JPG/SVG and instantly receive:
- icon.png (1024×1024) — main app icon
- adaptive-icon.png (1024×1024) — Android adaptive icon foreground
- splash-icon.png (1024×1024) — splash screen icon
- splash.png (1284×2778) — full splash screen
- favicon.png (48×48) — web favicon
- react-logo.png / @2x / @3x — React Native logo assets
- partial-react-logo.png — partial logo variant
- app.json — ready-to-use Expo config snippet

## Features

- 100% free, no sign-up required
- Client-side processing (images never leave your browser for icon generation)
- Supports PNG, JPG, JPEG, SVG input
- Background color picker with auto-detection from image
- Text logo creator — generate an icon from text without any design tools
- Instant ZIP download of all assets

## Tech Stack

Next.js 16, React 19, Tailwind CSS v4, Sharp (server-side image processing), TypeScript

## Pages

- / — Main icon generator tool
- /blog — Articles about Expo icon requirements, design best practices, automation
- /tutorials — Step-by-step guides for Expo app development and deployment
- /faq — Answers to common questions about icon formats and generation
- /contributors — GitHub contributors to the open-source project

## Links

- App: https://expo-assets-generator.vercel.app
- GitHub: https://github.com/WebNaresh/expo-icon-generator
- Blog: https://expo-assets-generator.vercel.app/blog
